Row.Text: Artists Protest the Eiffel Tower

"We, writers, painters, sculptors, architects and passionate devotees of the hitherto untouched beauty of {1_City}, protest with all our strength, with all our indignation in the name of slighted {2_Adj} taste, against the erection of this useless and monstrous Eiffel Tower. To bring our arguments home, imagine for a moment a giddy, ridiculous tower dominating {1_City} like a gigantic black smokestack, crushing under its barbaric bulk all of our humiliated monuments which will disappear in this ghastly dream."
Idiots.
We can't take it down! We're using it as a radio tower!
Fine, let's tear it down.
No effect.
{1_Num} and the city gains a Broadcast Tower.
3 Great Artists appear and the city loses the Eiffel Tower.
Artists staged a protest againt the Eiffel Tower.
The Eiffel Tower has been converted into a Broadcast Tower!
In response to criticism, the Eiffel Tower has been torn down. Local artists celebrate its removal!
Artists have staged protests against the Eiffel Tower in the {5_Adj} city of {2_CityDesc}.
In response to protests by local artists, the Eiffel Tower in the {5_Adj} city of {2_CityDesc} has been torn down.
Assassinated Official

There are those who are apparently so appalled by our policies that they've decided to show their displeasure by assassinating a city official. They were not particularly notable, but their death will result in some issues nonetheless.
Let local officials handle it
We must apprehend the scoundrel who did this!
+{3_Num} [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment.
{1_Num} and +{2_Num}.
We have decided to let local officials deal with the assassination of one of their own.
We have scoured out the murderer of one of our officials
Beast Stalks the City

Rumours have begun to filter that a monstrous beast stalks the city streets at the dead of night. Eye-witnesses claim that the beast is a demon, others claim it is the elusive wild haggis. Regardless, it is beginning to disquiet the city, and so the matter must be dealt with.
We do not address mere rumours.
Send the guard out to hunt this beast.
Capture the beast and put it in our Zoo!
Capture the beast and put it in our Menagerie!
50% chance that the City Zoo will receive +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
50% chance that the city's Menagerie will receive +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
We have sent our guards to hunt a dangerous beast.
We have embarked on a quest to hunt a dangerous beast.
Beast Stalks the City
Failure! The beast that had been stalking the city has evaded our capture![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Beast Stalks the City
Disaster! A Citizen has been killed by the beast that had been stalking the city! We have no choice but to hunt it down.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Beast Stalks the City
No sign of the beast that had been allegedly stalking the city has arisen. We must conclude that the rumours were false.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Beast Stalks the City
Erhm? The beast that had been stalking the city was nothing more than a man in a suit! It's the talk of the city![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Beast Stalks the City
Success! The beast that had been stalking the city has been captured and killed![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Bountiful Harvest

Owing to this year's excellent weather, the local farmers report an amazing surplus of food. Rarely has the earth ever yielded so much![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FOOD] to the city's Granary for 10 turns.
Corruption

Bureaucracy sometimes just doesn't work. The wrong men in the wrong places can lead to corrupt practices which hurt the country's income. Even worse, it will take a few years to get the proper paperwork to change it.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Death of a Great Artist
A Great Artist, known throughout the world for their marble sculptures, has met an untimely end. In their will, they have left behind their life's work to the the state.
Sell the art and fill our coffers.
We must take care and have this art put into storage.
Let us have this art put on display for the public to admire.
{1_Num} and +{2_Num}.
{1_Num} and receive a [ICON_GREAT_WORK] Great Work of Art in the next available slot.
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Choice unavailable:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You lack the required Yields OR you do not have a free Great Work of Art slot
We have sold a collection of art left to the state to a private collector.
We have put a collection of art left to the state into storage.
We have put a collection of art left to the state on public display.
Destitute Noble
A destitute noble, without lord or way, arrives at your court. They pledge their service to you, promising to do utmost to ensure your protection.
Turn the wretch away!
Clean them up and suit them with armour.
Confiscate their estate and have them executed.
No effect.
{1_Num} and receive a Great General.
{1_Num} and +{2_Num}.
We have recruited into our service a destitute noble.
We have executed a destitute noble and confiscated their estate.
Excellent Official

Our newly hired government officials have proven to be particularly skilled and efficient. Their administrative efforts can only serve to benefit the nation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.
Excellent Official

Our newly hired government officials have proven to be particularly skilled and efficient. Their diplomatic efforts can only serve to benefit the nation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries.
Gift to the State

Good governments would sometimes prompt the nobility and the businessmen of the realm to donate cash to the treasury, out of pure patriotism or in exchange for the sales or transfer of honorary titles and positions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Incompetent Diplomat

One of our diplomats, showing a lack of tact, has made some outrageous statements in front of {1_CityState}'s dignitaries, shocking and angering them. The man has embarrassed our country and damaged relations with {1_CityState}.
Time heals all wounds...
Perhaps we can smooth this over?
We've been planning to conquer them anyway.
-10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State.
{1_Num} and +15 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State.
-15 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State and receive a free Military Unit.
An incompetent diplomat has made some rather embarrassing remarks in front of a City-State.
An incompetent diplomat has made some rather embarrassing remarks in front of a City-State, but we have smoothed these over.
Meagre Harvest

Owing to this year's abysmal weather, the local farmers report a terrible deficit of food. Rarely has the earth ever yielded so little![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 [ICON_FOOD] to the city's Granary for 10 turns.
Mercenaries
A band of wandering soldiers have arried at your court, offering their services to us in exchange for good pay.[NEWLINE]
Arrest these deserters!
Clean them up and suit them with armour.
Turn them away. They do the military a dishonour.
{1_Num} and receive two free Units.
+{2_Num} and two Barbarian Units will attack.
We have arrested a band of wandering mercenaries.
We have recruited a band of wandering mercenaries.
We have turned away a band of wandering mercenaries.
Rebel Uprising

In order to ensure the glory of our country we have had to restrict local privileges. The problem with privileges is that people get very attached to them for sentimental reasons. Now, some power hungry idiot has declared himself the true ruler of our country, and many hopefuls flock to his banner because he has promised to restore local privileges.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]2 Rebel Units appear near the city.
Solar Eclipse
The nation stares in awe as the Sun slowly disappears behind a black disc in the sky; as the world turns to darkness despite it being mid-day. Your subjects are absolutely terrified.
Our prayers and sacrifices shall bring back the light.
There must be a reasonable explanation.
Divine intervention set the heavens in motion.
The laws of gravity dictate the motions of the sun and moon.
A new dawn for the Iroquois Confederacy!
A solar eclipse astounds the nation.
Successful Embassy
Our ambassadors have been very good at spreading a favourable opinion of us among the government of {1_CityState}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State.
Technological Breakthrough

Our ministers report that there has been a local development that is relevant to our understanding of {1_TechName}. They advise we investigate to learn if we can incorporate this new information into our current research.
Just send some people for a cursory investigation.
Investigate thoroughly and with scepticism.
50% chance to gain +{2_Num}.
Terrible Official

Our newly hired government officials have proven to be particularly terrible and inefficient. Their administrative efforts can only serve to ruin the nation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.
Terrible Official

Our newly hired government officials have proven to be particularly terrible and inefficient. Their diplomatic efforts can only serve to ruin the nation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries.
